A Book - I would bring a book to life so that it could read its own story to me. This way, I can learn new things while enjoying a good book.
A Painting - I would bring a painting to life so that it could move and dance to the music playing in the room. It would be like having my own personal art exhibit.
A Toy Car - I would bring a toy car to life so that it could take me on adventures around town. We could explore new places and have fun together.
A Pen - I would bring a pen to life so that it could write down all of my creative ideas. I could brainstorm new projects and inventions with this helpful assistant.
A Lamp - I would bring a lamp to life so that it could turn on and off whenever I need it. It would be like having my own personal light switch.
